name: NOT DEAD YET (Stepford)
description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Bones has been sent to hell - but he ain't dying yet. An intense "bullet-hell", there is no end goal. Just prolonging the death! This game was made in under 24 hours! A challenge to myself.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Controls:

  • WASD to Move.
  • Left Click to Shoot
  • Right Click to summon CONTROL ARROW, after killing ten enemies.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The art from this game is royalty free or drawn by me; most of it being from Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup. The music was made by Jacob Lizotte!

#retro #survival #shooter #arcade #action
